content.question: Which of the following statements is equivalent to the algorithm in the flowchart?

choices.label: Include, left arrow, open parenthesis, floor greater than 10, close parenthesis, OR, open parenthesis, bedrooms equal 3, close parenthesis
Include, left arrow, open parenthesis, floor greater than 10, close parenthesis, AND, open parenthesis, bedrooms equal 3, close parenthesis
Include, left arrow, open parenthesis, floor less than or equal to 10, close parenthesis, OR, open parenthesis, bedrooms equal 3, close parenthesis
Include, left arrow, open parenthesis, floor less than or equal to 10, close parenthesis, AND, open parenthesis, bedrooms equal 3, close parenthesis

content.answer: Include, left arrow, open parenthesis, floor greater than 10, close parenthesis, OR, open parenthesis, bedrooms equal 3, close parenthesis

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
